issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Duplicate non-persistent messages that are sent to a queue are either dispatched multiple times (i.e., not detected as duplicates) or cause the queue size to be miscalculated.

comments.body: A unit test that demonstrates the bug is forthcoming.
Did you ever manage to build an unit test?
